title: [Valley of Gold]
description: Surrounded by logs, a colorful stone fire pit dominates the clearing.   Each stone has been hand painted with a variety of colors and designs.  A pile of sticks has been neatly stacked nearby.  Large red oaks surround the area, their thick trunks casting shade across the glade.

Surrounded by logs, a colorful stone fire pit dominates the clearing.   Each stone has been hand painted with a variety of colors and designs.  A pile of sticks has been neatly stacked nearby.  Large red oaks surround the area, their thick trunks casting shadows across the glade.
paths: Obvious paths: north, east, south, west
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
